I should also consider his awards and recognition. Abilov received the "Tribute to Truth" literary award, which acknowledges his significant contribution to African American literature. This recognition might suggest that his work has a profound impact and offers something unique and valuable to the genre.

So, putting this all together, Abilov's unique take on African American narratives lies in his distinct perspective as an outsider, his ability to blend cultural elements, his intricate character development, and his focus on historical contexts.
